questions.questionText: In the novel Five Little Indians by Canadian Indigenous author Michelle Good, a group of teens released from residential schools attempt to find their place in downtown Vancouver.

answerOptions.responseText: Try again! Did you consider what downtown Vancouver might symbolize?
